statements: SELECT * FROM restoration_progress
SELECT restoration_id, progress_date FROM restoration_progress
SELECT milestone, photo_path FROM restoration_progress WHERE restoration_id = 1
SELECT * FROM restoration_progress ORDER BY progress_date DESC
SELECT restoration_id, milestone FROM restoration_progress WHERE progress_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT restoration_id, progress_date, milestone, photo_path FROM restoration_progress WHERE restoration_id = 100 ORDER BY progress_date DESC
SELECT milestone, photo_path, progress_date FROM restoration_progress WHERE milestone LIKE '%foundation%'
SELECT * FROM restoration_progress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND milestone = 'Roof Repair' ORDER BY restoration_id ASC
SELECT restoration_id, COUNT(*) AS milestone_count FROM restoration_progress GROUP BY restoration_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY milestone_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT milestone FROM restoration_progress ORDER BY milestone
SELECT * FROM restoration_log;
SELECT milestone, log_date FROM restoration_log ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT photo_url FROM restoration_photos WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM restoration_photos WHERE photo_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT DISTINCT milestone FROM restoration_log;
SELECT * FROM restoration_log;
SELECT log_id, log_date, milestone FROM restoration_log WHERE milestone = 'Initial Assessment' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_date, milestone, photo_url FROM restoration_log INNER JOIN restoration_photos ON restoration_log.log_id = restoration_photos.log_id WHERE photo_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM restoration_photos WHERE photo_url LIKE '%before%' ORDER BY photo_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, COUNT(photo_id) AS total_photos FROM restoration_photos GROUP BY log_id HAVING COUNT(photo_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_photos DESC;
SELECT * FROM restoration_progress_log;
SELECT id, milestone, date FROM restoration_progress_log WHERE id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name FROM milestones ORDER BY milestone_id DESC;
SELECT milestone, photo FROM restoration_progress_log WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT photo_data FROM photos WHERE photo_id = 1;
SELECT id, date, milestone FROM restoration_progress_log WHERE id = 1;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name FROM milestones ORDER BY milestone_name DESC;
SELECT id, date, milestone FROM restoration_progress_log WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT milestone_name, photo_data FROM milestones JOIN photos ON milestones.milestone_id = photos.photo_id;
SELECT id, date, milestone FROM restoration_progress_log WHERE milestone LIKE '%completed%' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress_log;
SELECT milestone, date FROM milestones ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM restoration_dates WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT log_id, milestone FROM progress_log WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM restoration_photos WHERE photo_id IN (SELECT photo_id FROM restoration_dates);
SELECT * FROM progress_log WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT milestone, date FROM progress_log ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM restoration_dates WHERE description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT progress_log.date, milestones.description FROM progress_log JOIN milestones ON progress_log.milestone = milestones.milestone
SELECT DISTINCT milestone FROM progress_log
SELECT * FROM restoration_progress;
SELECT milestone, restoration_date FROM restoration_progress WHERE restoration_id = 1;
SELECT log_date, log_message FROM restoration_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT photo_description FROM restoration_photos WHERE restoration_id = 3;
SELECT milestone_description, completion_date FROM restoration_milestones WHERE restoration_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM restoration_progress ORDER BY restoration_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT restoration_id, restoration_date, milestone FROM restoration_progress WHERE restoration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM restoration_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT restoration_id, photo_description FROM restoration_photos WHERE restoration_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_description, completion_date FROM restoration_milestones ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
